link_name: Find biggest files and directories in filesystem
link_desc:
The solution is based on zabbix_sender and system.run[,nowait] functionality which will create an hourly background process to scan the whole filesystem and report back everything to Zabbix by sending data to Zabbix trapper item.

Template designed for 5.0. Video explanation of how and why it works:

https://youtu.be/ZXry_Cm-23o
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Trapper|Dependent Items
